name: Indian Princess Fashion Salon
description:
Welcome To Indian Princess Fashion Salon Game.

Help to Indian Princess Fashion girl to look beauty with new Indian Princess stylist. Indian Princess Fashion Salon present Indian Princess Fashion makeup and costume. Every Indian Princess Fashion doll want to look like bridal Indian Princess girls in her own Indian Princess Fashion theme wedding.

Country theme makeover is always in Indian Princess for the Girls game and this style is famous like a celebrity or a hollywood rockstar specially for the Indian Princess Fashion girls . Enjoy This Indian Princess Fashion Salon!!

Well come to Indian Princess Fashion Salon. Beauty Queen to look beauty with new Indian Princess stylist. Every Beauty Queen want to look like Indian Princess FashionIndian Princess girls in her own theme .

Game Functionality:-
- Spa
- Makeup
- Dress up

-> Spa

Apply unique and beautiful face packs to make Girl look more beautiful!
Remove her pimples, extra eye brow hairs, under eye marks, black dots and give her a clean.

-> Make-up

- Beauty Queen to look beautiful with unique Dress and Make-up.
- Give her Indian Princess look with beautiful makeup.
- Give Beauty Queen more stunning look with unique eye shadows and glow.
- Make her cheeks more charming with unique cheek glow options

-> Dress up

We have specially created unique outfits to give your Beauty Queen to a perfect stunning and charming Indian Princess Fashion look!


# Ads: -
Please note this game is Free. In this Game No one Place Shown Ads Or No one In-app. so as to not to disturb you during Any path and You Can Enjoy with Game.
